original: @153b ` // bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @153b ` // bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Gurus

original: thog mar dge ba'i don /
analyzed: thog mar dge ba'i don /
translated: The meaning of the first virtue

original: sprul sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
analyzed: sprul sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
translated: The vajra song of taking the nirmanakaya as the path:🔽Om vajra tikchana.

original: aom badzra t'ikshna rdo rje rnon po bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: aom badzra t'ikshna rdo rje rnon po bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: Vajra sharpness, Bhagavat Amitabha.🔽Dhu khatsha che.

original: du:kha tstshe dmi mthun pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: du:kha tstshe dmi mthun pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Cutting through the suffering of adversity, Akshobhya.

original: pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /
analyzed: pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /
translated: Prajna jnana murtaye.

original: shes rab ye shes gti mug sel ba rnam snang ngo //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes gti mug sel ba rnam snang ngo //
translated: Wisdom, gnosis, dispelling delusion, Vairochana.

original: dzny'a na k'a ya /
analyzed: dzny'a na k'a ya /
translated: Jñana kaya.

original: ye shes kyi sku phrin las byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku phrin las byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
translated: Wisdom body, accomplishing activity, Amoghasiddhi.🔽Vagi shvara.

original: w'a g'i shva ra ngag gi dbang phyug gdul bya tshim pa /
analyzed: w'a g'i shva ra ngag gi dbang phyug gdul bya tshim pa /
translated: Lord of speech, satisfying disciples.

original: aa ra pa tsa ma skyes pa'i don rin chen 'byung ldan /
analyzed: aa ra pa tsa ma skyes pa'i don rin chen 'byung ldan /
translated: Arapachana.🔽Om te te hum.

original: aom te te h'um bde ba'i don rtogs /
analyzed: aom te te h'um bde ba'i don rtogs /
translated: The meaning of bliss is realized.🔽Tena hum.

original: te na h'um bde ba'i lam rnyed /
analyzed: te na h'um bde ba'i lam rnyed /
translated: The path of bliss is found.🔽Te te tena hum.

original: te te te na h'um gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: te te te na h'um gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob pa'o //
translated: Nondual bliss is attained.🔽Yate nam.

original: ya te na ma:theg chen ma nor ba yin no //
analyzed: ya te na ma:theg chen ma nor ba yin no //
translated: The Mahayana is unmistaken.

original: bar du dge ba'i don ni /
analyzed: bar du dge ba'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of the middle virtue

original: longs sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
analyzed: longs sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
translated: The vajra song that takes the sambhogakaya as the path:

original: aom sthi to hri di chos thams cad rang bzhin skye med kyi ngo bor gnas /
analyzed: aom sthi to hri di chos thams cad rang bzhin skye med kyi ngo bor gnas /
translated: Om. Sthito hr idi. All phenomena abide in the essence of the unborn nature.

original: dzny'a na m'urti ra ham /
analyzed: dzny'a na m'urti ra ham /
translated: Jnana murti ra hum.

original: ye shes kyi bde ba rang la yod /
analyzed: ye shes kyi bde ba rang la yod /
translated: The bliss of wisdom exists in oneself.

original: buddho buddh'a n'a na /
analyzed: buddho buddh'a n'a na /
translated: Buddho budhanaan.

original: sangs rgyas sems can ye nas gnyis su med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can ye nas gnyis su med /
translated: Buddhas and sentient beings are primordially nondual.

original: tyee ddh'a bart'i n'a na /
analyzed: tyee ddh'a bart'i n'a na /
translated: Tyedhavarti nan.

original: dus gsum gyi don brjod pa las 'das pa'i gnas yin /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi don brjod pa las 'das pa'i gnas yin /
translated: This is the place that transcends expression of the meaning of the three times.

original: bde ba'i don ston /
analyzed: bde ba'i don ston /
translated: The meaning of bliss is taught.

original: te na h'um /
analyzed: te na h'um /
translated: Tena hum.

original: bde ba'i lam rnyed /
analyzed: bde ba'i lam rnyed /
translated: The path of bliss is found.

original: te te te na h'um thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob po //
analyzed: te te te na h'um thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob po //
translated: Tettete nan hum. The bliss of nondual method and prajna is attained.

original: mthar thug dag pa'i don ni /
analyzed: mthar thug dag pa'i don ni /
translated: The ultimate meaning of purity:

original: chos sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
analyzed: chos sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni /
translated: The vajra song that takes the dharmakaya as the path:

original: aom sarba dharm'a ya a'a /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a ya a'a /
translated: Om. Sarva dharmaya a.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid /
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid /
translated: All phenomena are nonarising.

original: aom sarba dharm'a /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a /
translated: Om. Sarva dharmaya i i.

original: ai a'i / skye med skye ba med pa nyid du snang /
analyzed: ai a'i / skye med skye ba med pa nyid du snang /
translated: Nonarising appears as nonarising.

original: aom sarba dharm'a au a'u /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a au a'u /
translated: Om. Sarva dharmaya u u.

original: ma skyes chos rnams dus gsum yid kyis dran /
analyzed: ma skyes chos rnams dus gsum yid kyis dran /
translated: Unborn phenomena are remembered in the three times.

original: aom sarba dharm'a ae aee /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a ae aee /
translated: Oṃ sarva dharma ai aei.

original: chos rnams skye med mi 'da' dam tshig nyid //
analyzed: chos rnams skye med mi 'da' dam tshig nyid //
translated: The non-passing of unborn phenomena is the very samaya.

original: aom sarba dharm'a ao aoo /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a ao aoo /
translated: Oṃ sarva dharma o oṃ.🔽All phenomena are the supreme enjoyment.

original: chos rnams thams cad longs spyod mchog / aom sarba dharm'a @154a * //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad longs spyod mchog / aom sarba dharm'a @154a * //
translated: Oṃ sarva dharma aṃ.

original: aam / chos thams cad 'bras bu bde ba che /
analyzed: aam / chos thams cad 'bras bu bde ba che /
translated: All phenomena are the result, great bliss.🔽Oṃ sarva dharma aḥ.

original: aom sarba dharm'a aa:chos sku bde ba chen po nyid kyi don /
analyzed: aom sarba dharm'a aa:chos sku bde ba chen po nyid kyi don /
translated: The meaning of the great bliss of the dharmakāya.🔽Oṃ te te hūṃ.

original: aom te te h'um bde ba'i don rtogs /
analyzed: aom te te h'um bde ba'i don rtogs /
translated: The meaning of bliss is realized.🔽Te na hūṃ.

original: te na h'um bde ba'i lam rnyed /
analyzed: te na h'um bde ba'i lam rnyed /
translated: The path of bliss is found.🔽Te te na hūṃ.

original: te te te na h'um gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob /
analyzed: te te te na h'um gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob /
translated: Nondual bliss is attained.🔽Ya te na maḥ.

original: ya te na ma:theg pa chen po ma nor ba yin glu dang po bum dbang thob bas blang //
analyzed: ya te na ma:theg pa chen po ma nor ba yin glu dang po bum dbang thob bas blang //
translated: The first song is sung by one who has obtained the vase empowerment.

original: glu bar pa de gsang dbang dang / shes rab ye shes thob pas blang /
analyzed: glu bar pa de gsang dbang dang / shes rab ye shes thob pas blang /
translated: The middle song is sung by one who has obtained the secret empowerment and the wisdom consort empowerment.

original: glu gsum pa de dbang bzhi thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos blang ngo //
analyzed: glu gsum pa de dbang bzhi thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos blang ngo //
translated: The third song is sung by a great yogin who has obtained the four empowerments.

original: rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje glu'i gdams ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction of the vajra song is complete.
